text: Lists of monarchs in the British Isles are lists of monarchs that have reigned over the various kingdoms and other states that have existed in the British Isles throughout recorded history. They include monarchs of Britain as a whole, and monarchs of states that covered part or whole of what are now England, Ireland, Scotland, Wales and the Isle of Man. ==Britain== *Great Britain and the United Kingdom ==England== *England *Heptarchy *Bernicia *Deira *Lindsey *Mercia *Wessex ==Ireland== *Monarchy ==Scotland== *Scotland ==Wales== *Wales *Elmet ==Mann== *Mann **Mann (lords) Category:Lists of British monarchs
title: Lists of monarchs in the British Isles
